document.full_text: the boston bruins and tampa bay lightning may be as different as country music and jazz but they have been two of the nhl's hottest post-season acts and set the stage for an intriguing eastern conference final.
document.title: clash of styles sets stage for intriguing east final
lines_and_colors: the boston bruins and tampa bay lightning may be as different as country music and jazz but they have been two of the nhl's hottest post-season acts and set the stage for an intriguing eastern conference final.
